document.full_text: a series of widely circulated photographs purporting to show "gossip girl" actress blake lively posing naked are "100 percent fake," her spokeswoman said on tuesday.
document.title: blake lively "nude" pictures fake, publicist says
lines_and_colors: a series of widely circulated photographs purporting to show "gossip girl" actress blake lively posing naked are "100 percent fake," her spokeswoman said on tuesday.
